steps.title: Welcome to the contact summary.
steps.content: This is the main view of your contacts in CiviCRM. Let's take a look around...

steps.title: View and edit contact information.
steps.content: Click on a box to add or edit this contact's email, phone, address, etc.

steps.title: Click to edit name
steps.content: You can edit this contact's name by clicking here.

steps.title: Things you can do.
steps.content: The actions menu gives a quick list of ways you can interact with this contact.

steps.title: Related information in tabs.
steps.content: Click around in the other tabs to see this contact's contributions, activities, relationships, etc.

steps.title: Custom Data
steps.content: All the custom fields your organization has created for contacts are shown here. You can click to edit these too.
